

#### Solution

```{r, echo=FALSE, results='asis'}
  mns_B = matrix(with(dat,tapply(Data, FactorB, mean)),nrow=1)
  colnames(mns_B) = paste('b',1:3)
  rownames(mns_B) = "Marginal  Means Factor B: "
  
  knitr::kable(mns_B, digits = 2, format = "html", table.attr = "class=\"anovatab2\"")
  
```  
  
```{r, echo=FALSE, results='asis'}
  
  sds_B = matrix(with(dat,tapply(Data, FactorB, sd)),nrow=1)
  colnames(sds_B) = paste('b',1:3)
  rownames(sds_B) = "Marginal SDs Factor B: "
  
  knitr::kable(sds_B, digits = 2, format = "html", table.attr = "class=\"anovatab2\"")

```
